name: Binary Hacker
description:
Hack through dozens of mind-bending puzzles with a retro computeresque theme.

In simple terms, the point of the game is to make the top grid look like the bottom one. However, things are easier said than done. In Binary Hacker whenever you place down a block, the ones next to it turn into the opposite of what they were (0s turn to 1s, 1s to 0s).

Good luck!
